individual.title.title.segment: Mesa Underwriters Specialty Insurance Co., Plaintiff,

csc.bold: Order Adopting Magistrate Judge's Report and Recommendation; Granting Motion for Default Judgment
Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers United States District Court Judge

para.paratext: The Court has reviewed Magistrate Judge Corley's Report and Recommendation to Grant Plaintiff's Motion for Default Judgment (Dkt. No. 58), to which no party filed an objection. The Court finds the Report correct, well-reasoned and thorough, and adopts it in every respect, except that the Court also Grants Plaintiff's request for costs incurred in this action, as allowed by law. Plaintiff shall comply with standard procedures and submit proof of costs to the Clerk of Court with the appropriate application.
Accordingly, and for the reasons set forth in the Report, Plaintiff's Motion for Default Judgment (Dkt. No. 52) is Granted. The Judgment shall be entered by separate Order.
